metadata.synopsis: A hired assassin (Dolph Lundgren) believes that his partner (Gina Bellman) in a failed mission has orders to kill him.

reviews: ...an exceedingly erratic piece of work that grows less and less interesting as time progresses...
Silent Trigger is a bland bit of cheapo bullroar that seeks to capitalize on the six people in the world with some excitement left for the next Lundgren miscue.
